item.title: Birdwatching with Sean Bean: best podcasts of the week

item.title: My search for the perfect Danish pastry in Copenhagen
item.description: Open sandwiches (smørrebrød), meatballs (frikadeller), crispy pork belly (stegt flæsk) … There are many must-eat dishes for food lovers visiting Denmark, though perhaps nothing springs to mind as readily as the Danish pastry.

item.title: Bad Bunny makes Grammy history as he wins best album
item.description: Bad Bunny, the shape-shifting Puerto Rican musician, has made Grammy Award history, by becoming the first artist to win album of the year with a record sung entirely in Spanish.

item.title: Do you like cat photos? Are you constantly distracted? You’re probably actually quite good at focussing: 10 myths about attention
item.description: It’s believed that we have about 50,000 thoughts a day: big, small, urgent, banal – “Did I leave the oven on?”.
